name: Velocity (itch) (sei556)
description:
Hey there !                                                                                                   [Version Alpha 1.2]

Do you like jump n' runs but jumping high on mushrooms just doesn't cut it anymore ?

Do you like a real challenge ?

Do you want to get knocked kilometers away by buggy physics ? (I hope not, because that's going to be patched soon)

Do you want to play the "Darksouls of the Jump n Runs" ?

Well, then listen up:

Velocity is a physics based 3D jump n run game. Your velocity decides on how hard you will push back the objects you jump on (or hit if you jump against them). Only you are effected by gravity.

"Velocity" aims at the small group of people who love playing 3D jump n runs, who love finding their own way to solve a level and get the best time on it.

___________________

So far there is only a tutorial followed up by 2 short levels.

There are still some known bugs that will be fixed in the future.

I'd love to get some feedback from both, casual and hardcore players.

If you want to post videos about you playing the game, feel free to do so, but please send me a link of the video ! I'd love to see other people testing my game !

You can also send me ideas or other kinds of feedback at velocity.game@outlook.de

This is my first game (besides one I made for  a game jam) and I'm still learning new stuff every day.
